job.title: NVMe Test Engineer - 21-01281
job.description:
Hi Johnnie,

 

Greetings from LeadStack! Hope you are doing well and staying safe! We have an immediate contract position with our direct client in San Jose, CA

If you are interested and available, please respond with your resume ASAP and suggest some times when I can call you.


Location: San Jose, CA – has to be local – this is 100% onsite role – relocation is not preferred – so stick to locals who can commute please. We also will need to check that candidate is fully vaccinated.

Duration: 6 months

 

 

 

Job Description:

Looking for Test engineer in the NVMe Customer Qualification test team in Samsung's enterprise product division. Candidate will work on NVMe Solid State Drives on execution and debug of OEM drive qualification tests. Candidate will primarily understand test scripts and debug failures that arise during test execution with the development team.

Candidate needs to have an experience in at least 1 front end storage protocol like NVMe/PCIe, FC, SAS is preferred. Candidate should have some programming/scripting background (Perl, Shell or Python is preferred). Familiarity with SSD or HDD testing is a plus.

Candidate must have experience with NetApp enterprise storage systems setup (ONTAP), testing (NDATE) and debug. Familiar with one of protocol analyzers like LeCroy, SerialTek, or Xgig. Experience with system or device level performance analysis.

Requirements:

- Setup NetApp storage systems, execute customer qual tests and debug failures - SSD or HDD testing - Experience with NetApp enterprise systems (ONTAP and NDATE) setup, testing and debug - Familiar with one of protocol analyzers like LeCroy, SerialTek, or Xgig - System or device level performance analysis - Front-end Storage protocol like NVMe/PCIe, Fibre Channel, SAS Scripting experiences such as in Perl, Shell or Python

 

Regards

Neetu Jha

Direct: 628-226-0998 

Email: neetu.jha@leadstackinc.com

1390 Market St, Ste 200, San Francisco, CA

www.leadstackinc.com
